name: Sea Kayak South Route
description: This route starts in a beach 50 kilometres south of Lima,  we take you there in our transport from your hotel, we are going to paddle around a beautiful zone full of spectacular rock cliffs, then,  after 6 kilometres we will land in a beach where we will take a rest,  eat some food and have a great relaxing time, then we will return passing again for this marvelous landscape where usually is easy to watch lots of marine birds
